name: Brotherhood of the Dragon
description:
Rescue the Brotherhood of the Dragon missing knights to help you defeat the Fearsome Beast of the East

"The dragon will die, but no one will cry,
stronger together, the King lives forever!"

Controls:

Move:     WASD / Arrow Keys
Attack:   Ctrl / Z key / A Button
Jump:     Space / X key / Y Button  (gamepad users: sorry about that, couldn't test it before uploading)

My humble entry for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1.
As usual on this kind of events... barely manage to submit in time (4 minutes before the deadline)
Spent too much time working on the combat system. Run out of time for putting all the level design ideas I had in mind. The level was done 40 minutes before the deadline, so forgive me the completely lack of challenge.
Anyway, hope you enjoy this short adventure game.

Made in Unity 2020.1.10f1
Visual Studio 2019
Models done in Blender 2.90.1
The knight and the dragon were done for the Sketchfab's 3December2020 Challenge (https://skfb.ly/6XMLR), so I decided to re utilize them, although had to do some hard work on them, specially on the dragon.
The skeletons and the rest of the assets were made from scratch.
Music composed in BoscaCeoil (after HOURS of listening Medieval music for inspiration)
